meanings.definition: A real or imaginary line about which a body rotates.
meanings.sent1: The Earth's axis helps it spin around.
meanings.sent2: The wheel's axis allows it to turn smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The dancing robot's axis got dizzy from all the spinning.
meanings.sent4: Her unwavering determination was the axis around which her life revolved.
meanings.sent5: The axis of the carousel made the children giggle with delight.

meanings.definition: A central or principal structure, feature, or element.
meanings.sent1: The heart is the axis of the circulatory system.
meanings.sent2: The sun is the axis of our solar system.
meanings.sent3: The cake's delicious frosting was the axis of the party.
meanings.sent4: His charisma was the axis that held the team together.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse stood tall as the axis of the coastline.

meanings.definition: A straight line that divides something into symmetrical halves.
meanings.sent1: The mirror's axis split the reflection perfectly in half.
meanings.sent2: The ruler's axis helped in drawing a straight line.
meanings.sent3: The pizza cutter's axis made slicing the pizza a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her decision became the axis dividing her past from her future.
meanings.sent5: The sword's sharp edge acted as the axis of balance in the duel.
